features.title: Everything You Need to
features.subtitle: Whether you're a fitness enthusiast, a bookworm, or a lifelong learner, Portal has the tools to help you find and book {{categories}}.
features.discoverNearbyDesc: Find gyms, libraries, and coaching centers near you with our interactive map and smart filters.
features.easyBookingDesc: Book appointments in seconds. View real-time availability and never miss a slot again.
features.trackProgressDesc: Monitor your attendance streaks, achievements, and personal growth over time.
features.smartRemindersDesc: Get timely notifications for appointments, fee dues, and important updates.
features.seamlessPaymentsDesc: Pay fees online, download receipts, and keep track of all your transactions.
features.communityDesc: Connect with fellow members, share experiences, and stay motivated together.
features.powerfulTools: Powerful Tools to Grow Your Business
features.powerfulToolsDesc: From member management to analytics, get everything you need to run and scale your gym, library, or coaching center.
features.memberManagementDesc: Easily manage members, track attendance, and handle fee collection all in one place.
features.analyticsDashboardDesc: Get insights into revenue, member retention, peak hours, and business growth.
features.secureCompliantDesc: Enterprise-grade security with GDPR compliance and role-based access control.
features.mobileOptimizedDesc: Manage your business on-the-go with our fully responsive mobile experience.

howItWorks.title: Get Started in
howItWorks.subtitle: Whether you're looking to join a gym, find a quiet library, or get coaching, Portal makes it easy to discover and book what you need.
howItWorks.discoverDesc: Browse categories, view venues on an interactive map, and read real reviews from other users.
howItWorks.compareDesc: Filter by price, amenities, location, and availability. Find the perfect match for your needs.
howItWorks.bookDesc: Select your time slot, check real-time availability, and get instant confirmation.
howItWorks.experienceDesc: Check-in at the venue, enjoy your session, and leave a review to help others.
howItWorks.noCreditCard: No credit card required ‚Ä¢ Free forever for basic features
